content: when working decreases double check your st count leg on the first round after the heel pick up one st at each one of the corners where the instep meets the bottom the foot on the next round k these sts together with the first and last stitch of the heel respectively this closes the gap between the instep and foot so there won t be a hole knit 20 22 24 26 sts for back of leg next round rs work first 20 22 24 26 as established then knit the remaining 20 22 24 26 back of leg sts in stockinette continue working in pattern as established ribbed pattern for instep stockinette for back of leg until leg measures 3 / 7 5 cm less than desired finished length cuff adjust for 2x1 ribbing size 1 & 4 decrease 1 st instep work as established until 2 remain k2tog back of leg k1 p1 k2 p1 to end size 2 decrease 2 sts instep k2tog work as established until 2 of remain ssk back of leg p1 k2 p1 to end size 3 no change work k2 p1 as established until cuff measures 3 / 2 5 cm or desired length bind off loosely in pattern using a stretchy bind off of choice weave in ends and block as desired © claire borchardt 2023 5 / #butfirstsocks
